citation: Proclamation under the Land Use Planning and Approvals Amendment Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Land Use Planning and Approvals Amendment Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Land Use Planning and Approvals Amendment Act 2013 fix 1 January 2014 as the day on which sections 11, 12, 13, 25 and 26 of that Act commence.

16 December 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Planning

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 December 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
